item.title: Roasted Vegetable Lasagne
item.description: Cooks' notes Roasted vegetables can be prepared 1 day ahead. Store, covered, in the refrigerator. Sauce can be made 1 day ahead. Cover surface with wax paper and chill. Rewarm over low heat, stirring often, before using.
